definitions.text: terms referring to the Judeo-Christian God
a clergyman or other person in religious orders
perceive intuitively or through some inexplicable perceptive powers
search by divining, as if with a rod
examples: He claimed he could divine underground water
everything is black or white...satanic or godly

definitions.text: being or having the nature of a god; -J.G.Frazier; ; ; -J.G.Saxe
examples: the custom of killing the divine king upon any serious failure of his...powers
'Tis wise to learn; 'tis God-like to create

definitions.text: devoted to or in the service or worship of a deity
appropriate to or befitting a god; ; ; -R.H.Roveref
examples: man must play God for he has acquired certain godlike powers

definitions.text: being of such surpassing excellence as to suggest inspiration by the gods
